system.sustained:
Whilst power is sustained, once per round can spend a Half Action to make an Opposed Willpower vs Target Individual's Toughness. If successful target suffers 1 Fatigue, +1 per Degree of Success, if the target would be rendered unconcious through this Fatigue any excess Fatigue instead causes 5 Damage each. If this damage exceeds the target's wounds they instantly die, their heart and brain detonating.
For every 5 points above threshold, gain +10 to Opposed Willpower Test.
